FuncDef:
The global-pool command creates a public network address pool for static source tracing algorithm and displays the public network address pool view.
The undo global-pool command deletes the created public network address pool.
By default, no public network address pool is created for static source tracing algorithm.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the public network address pool for static source tracing.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 2000.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The static source tracing algorithm parameters include the private network address pool, public network address pool, port range, and port size. A public network address pool can consist of multiple public network address segments. To create a public network address pool or enter the public network address pool view, run the global-pool command.
Follow-up Procedure
In the public network address pool view for static source tracing algorithm, run the section command to add public network address segments to the public network address pool for the static source tracing algorithm.
Precautions
If static source tracing algorithm parameters have been configured, a bound public network address pool cannot be deleted, or no address segments can be added to the public network address pool view.
